snippet: Peruvian miners trapped for six days in an abandoned copper mine prayed, told each other jokes and even danced in an attempt to hold onto hope, before they finally were freed Wednesday.
abstract: Peruvian miners trapped for six days in an abandoned copper mine are finally freed; the miners walked out, unaided, from a reinforced tunnel that rescuers had built as they removed more than 26 feet of dirt and rock
lead_paragraph: Peruvian miners trapped for six days in an abandoned copper mine prayed, told each other jokes and even danced in an attempt to hold onto hope, before they finally were freed Wednesday.
